Monster Farm Beginner's Blues
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Monster Farm Beginner's Blues
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, September 30, 2000 - 10:16 pm:

Here's an unfinished snippett:
To the tune of "Another Saturday Night" ©Sam Cooke

Another Saturday night and I ain't got no money
-My monster fails, and he just won't win!
I need a purse from any tourney,
let's get it over and hit reset again!

By Dark Phoenix on Friday, November 3, 2000 - 06:05 pm:

Here's a snippet I came up with awhile back, It's a Blues tune, and I got it from , of all things, a macaroni & cheese commercial:)

"That mean ol' Hopper"
"That no good nasty thing"
"He gave me the finger"
"Instead of digging up my spring"
